content:
My training data only goes up to october 2021, but as far as i know, there is a vibrant nightlife scene in chennai (formerly known as madras) that visitors can check out. some popular places for live music and entertainment include:

1. bay 146: this popular music lounge offers live performances by local and international musicians, as well as theme nights and drink specials.

2. dublin: this irish pub is known for its live music performances, including rock, blues, and jazz.

3. the leather bar: located in the luxury hotel, the park, this nightclub features a variety of djs and live music performers, as well as a dance floor and private party areas.

4. opus bar: this trendy rooftop bar offers live music and djs, as well as great views of the city.

5. pasha: this nightclub in the taj coromandel hotel is popular with locals and visitors alike, and offers a high-energy atmosphere with live music and djs playing house, techno, and other electronic genres.

overall, chennai has a thriving nightlife scene with something for everyone, whether you're looking for live music, dance clubs, or intimate bars and lounges.
